amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds in the bill by 1 percent across-the-board excepting the FBI and specified accounts for the Department of Justice.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds in the bill by 1 percent across-the-board excepting the FBI and specified accounts for the Department of Justice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 257 (Roll no. 278).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 257 (Roll no. 278).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
